title: Mundo's Corperate Skin can not use in the game!
body: I have a very good Mundo's Corperate Skin, i get it from box random, however, in my champion list, It shows I owned it, but today when I play in Rank game, It shows I didn't own it, and I can't use. I'm so sad, and I lost that  game. Would some guy help me to solve this question. The same situation also happens in ARAM  and Blind pick model. It is a BUG!!!!!!

replies.body:
Hey HOPRAUL,

Corporate Mundo is currently disabled due to a bug. He'll be available again soon!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Ao1jEGFw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-05T20:27:56.110+0000)
>
> Hey HOPRAUL,
> 
> Corporate Mundo is currently disabled due to a bug. He'll be available again soon!

I've noticed quite a few posts regarding the skin not being able to be used.

Maybe an alert on the top of the League window that says something of such (like when Darius and Caitlyn were disabled)
There was a ticker at the top for a while. Updates like this will always be listed on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Ao1jEGFw,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-07-06T04:41:01.452+0000)
>
> There was a ticker at the top for a while. Updates like this will always be listed on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page. :]

Oh I was not aware of such a page.

Thank you!
